column2: My religion does not permit slavery.
The slaves in this province are upset. There is fear that some may organize a revolt.
This character has enlisted slaves to fight in his army. This is seen as unsightly and desperate by nobility.
Begin a slave raid to fill your holdings.
The people of §Y$TITLE$§! practice the despicable custom of slavery. We must set their slaves free!
A holding to host a small number of slaves.
A holding to host a large number of slaves.
A holding to host a massive number of slaves.
There are only a handful of slaves in this province, but enough to supplement the efforts of free laborers.
This province has many slave camps, which provide a large enough labor force to form a viable alternative to free servants.
This province has a vast number of slave camps, and the majority of labor is preformed by slaves.
A large number of the slaves of this province have been freed of their service.
The practice of slavery can take many forms, and is widespread throughout the world, though it is forbidden by many religions and customs.
Slavery is outlawed in the Realm
Slavery is generally outlawed  in the Realm, but contract service is allowed.
Slavery is permitted in the Realm, but offspring have the rights of Citizenship.
Full Chattel Slavery is legal in the Realm.
This character owns and trades slaves
This character was once a slave, but, by either force of arms or their master's mercy, has now been set free.
This character is a fanatical opponent of the practice of slavery, seeking to eliminate it from the world by any means necessary.
The war grows desperate, you can do the unthinkable and arm the slaves.
Seek out a Slave trader and purchase a host of slaves to work in your capital
Sell one of your slave lots to a slave trader
Seek out a slave trader and sell [Root.GetBestName]
As [Root.GetFirstName]'s master, you can force [Root.GetFirstName] into bed whether she wants to comply or not.
As [Root.GetFirstName]'s master, you can force [Root.GetFirstName] and [FromFrom.GetFirstName] to breed.
Release [Root.GetFirstName] [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] from the bondage of slavery and grant [Root.GetHerHim] [Root.GetHerHis] freedom.
Seize all of [Root.GetFirstName]'s possessions. As a slave, they have no rights to private property.
See how many slaves you have in your court

[master.GetFirstName] calls you into [master.GetHerHis] bedchambers, 'I have need of you tonight, remove your clothes.' You reluctantly slip from your garb and approach the master's bed. Tears well in your eyes as [master.GetSheHe] begins to fondle you. 'Now, onto the bed.'

You command [slave.GetFirstName] into the bed, where you grip him roughly and begin to slowly stroke. He groans a few times before becoming tumescent. Your lips curl into a grin and you begin to touch yourself. Soon, the darkened halls begin echoing with your moans of pleasure.

You command [slave.GetFirstName] into the bed, you slowly massage yourself as you look upon her. You then slid your hand up her thigh, she begins to shiver. A grin forms on your face as you forcibly take hold over her. She releases a weak moan when you slip a finger inside. You douse the light as you slip into the bed.
As a matter of course you discover [runaway_slave.GetFirstName] in the nearby fields with supplies. You realize [runaway_slave.GetSheHe] is attemping to flee and give chase.
You catch up to [runaway_slave.GetFirstName] and take [runaway_slave.GetHerHim] to the ground, but despite your efforts [runaway_slave.GetSheHe] slips away. You've lost a slave.
You catch up to [runaway_slave.GetFirstName] and take [runaway_slave.GetHerHim] to the ground, you soon gain control and ensnare the runaway.
A great reckus comes from the slave hold, you race out and find two slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName] and [slave_2.GetFirstName], in a heated fight.
That's enough of that, end it here.
You begin to notice that two slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName] and [slave_2.GetFirstName], are more productive when working together, perhaps they are friends.
[slave_1.GetFirstName] has been injured in the course of [slave_1.GetHerHis] duties.
[slave_1.GetFirstName] has begun to show the wears of age, [slave_1.GetSheHe] is visibly less attractive.
You happen upon [slave_1.GetFirstName] in the study with a book. It appears that [slave_1.GetSheHe] has been learning to read and, apparently, increased [slave_1.GetHerHis] abilities.

A passing caravan has brought with it a number of slaves. One of the slaves, [slave_1.GetFirstName], has caught your eye as a quality sort and, after some negotiation, the caravan turns [slave_1.GetHerHim] over to you.
[master.GetFirstName] enters the slave hold, a menacing smirk on [master.GetHerHis] face. 'You are to couple and bear a child.'
[mare.GetFirstName] stares at you, defiance burning in [mare.GetHerHis] eyes. 'I can not.'
[master.GetFirstName] smirking face turns upon you. 'You are to bed her, now.'
[stud.GetFirstName] stares at you, defiance burning in [stud.GetHerHis] eyes. 'I can not.'

You watch as [stud.GetFirstName] stokes [stud.GetHerHis] fires, after a few moments without result you bark at [mare.GetFirstName], 'Aid [stud.GetHerHim].' [mare.GetSheHeCap] does as bid and begins to stroke [stud.GetHerHim]. [stud.GetSheHeCap] rises and enters [mare.GetFirstName], they both look away as [stud.GetSheHe] starts to trust. After [stud.GetSheHe] has spilled, they back away from one another, their gazes downcast.

[master.GetFirstName] enters the slave hold and scans the room, soon [master.GetHerHis] gaze falls on you with [master.GetHerHis] face forming into a sinister grin. [master.GetHerHis] hand rises, finger outstretched, 'You, Come with me.'

You bring [slave.GetFirstName] to your shed. As you enter, you light the nearby torch. 'Come in,' you call to [slave.GetFirstName]. [slave.GetSheHeCap] slowly makes way into the room. You feel the gleeful grin grow as you scan the instruments about you.
What am I doing??! This is wrong!

Your body trembles as you watch [master.GetFirstName] slowly study the instruments scattered about the room. Then [master.GetHerHis] hand takes up the whip and you let out a whimper.'Hands on the wall.' [master.GetFirstName] barks

Your body trembles as you watch [master.GetFirstName] slowly study the instruments scattered about the room. Then [master.GetHerHis] hand takes up the knife and you let out a whimper.'Hands on the wall.' [master.GetFirstName] barks

Your body trembles as you watch [master.GetFirstName] slowly study the instruments scattered about the room. 'Something a bit more creative I think.' 'Sit in the chair.' You whimper as [master.GetFirstName] barks and [master.GetSheHe] stokes a braizer with a poker.

Your body trembles as you watch [master.GetFirstName] slowly study the instruments scattered about the room. 'Something a bit more creative I think.' 'Come here.' You whimper when [master.GetFirstName] approaches a barrel of water and removes the lid.

Your body trembles as you watch [master.GetFirstName] slowly study the instruments scattered about the room. 'Something a bit more creative I think.' You whimper when [master.GetFirstName] approaches the rack in the center of the room and barks at you, 'On the table.'

'Hands on the wall.' [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] follows the command. You rear back and unleash the whip against [slave.GetFirstName]'s back, [slave.GetSheHe] screams in agony as [slave.GetHerHis] back is ripped open and blood spurts. You smile, 'One.'

'Hands on the wall.' [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] follows the command. You take the knife and press it against [slave.GetFirstName]'s back and slide it. [slave.GetSheHeCap] wails from the cut and blood spurts, you taste metal as a bit enters your mouth. With a smile, you press the knife again.

You stir the fire with a poker then command [slave.GetFirstName], 'Sit in the chair.' [slave.GetSheHeCap] does as bid and you can hear the chair squeak from [slave.GetFirstName] trembling. When the poker is red hot, you press it into [slave.GetFirstName]'s arm. You smile at [slave.GetSheHe] screams as [slave.GetHerHis] flesh boiling and the smell of cooked flesh wafts to you.

'Come here.' You command. [slave.GetFirstName] trembles as [slave.GetSheHe] approaches the barrel of water. You pull the lid then grab [slave.GetFirstName]'s neck and shove [slave.GetHerHis] head into the barrel. [slave.GetFirstName] limbs fail about as [slave.GetSheHe] struggles for breath, once they stop, you pull [slave.GetHerHim] from the water. As [slave.GetFirstName] collects [slave.GetHerHim]self, you smile, 'Again.'

[slave.GetFirstName] begins to tremble when you command, 'On the table.' As [slave.GetSheHe] does, you slip the bindings on [slave.GetHerHis] limbs. 'Stop resisting' you bark as [slave.GetSheHe] pulls away from the last bind. Finally in place, you begin to turn the wheel. [slave.GetFirstName] screams as the bindings grow tight, then when you hear cracking you smile wide and give the wheel another turn.
The Indenture of [From.GetFirstName] has come to an end.
A child has been born to one of your slaves, [slave_parent.GetFirstName].
I have enough slaves, be done with it.
Slavery has been ended in the Realm.
As Part of our Victory, we have rounded up a portion of the enemy population.
The slaves have bred and multiplied, the holds have been expanded to accommodate them.
Disease and death have diminished the slave population in great number, the holds have been shrunk for better management of the diminishing population.
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s religion is one traditionally opposed to slavery
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s culture is one that traditionally practices slavery
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s culture is one traditionally opposed to slavery
[This.GetTitledFirstName]'s religion is one that traditionally practices slavery
You have finally found the time and have presented [From.GetFirstName] for sale at the local slave market. You sign the parchment, exhange the whip, and now [From.GetFirstName] is sold.
You have decided to purchase more slaves to work in [Root.Capital.GetName]. After hours of barking with the slave trader and his interpreter, you have finally settled on a price.
You have decided to sell a large number of the slaves working for you in [Root.Capital.GetName]. The slave trader eagerly inspects your stock before coming up with a fair price.

You have gathered all of the able-bodied slaves in [Root.Capital.GetName] and organized them into a small fighting force. You promise them their freedom if they decide to fight for you, and many eagerly pledge their loyalty. Your Marshal cautions you about making such promises.

Slaves who fought for you in your last war are causing unrest in [Root.Capital.GetName]. It seems they wholeheartedly believed your promise to free them and demand that they be rewarded for their efforts.
Get these things out of my sight!
Recant your promise to free the slaves after they fought for you. They won't be too happy, but they're slaves so do their feelings even matter?
I gave them my word. So it shall be.

column3: Exiger que votre vassal libère des parents

column2: One of your vassals owns one of your kinsmen as a slave. As their liege you can command them to release them into your care.
column3: L'un de vos vassaux détient l'un de vos parents en esclavage. En tant que suzerain, vous pouvez exiger sa libération.

column2: will be commanded to free your relative
column3: se verra ordonner de libérer votre parent(e).

column2:
[Root.GetTitle] [Root.GetFirstName], it is come to my attention that amongst your slaves are my kinsmen. As your liege I command that you release them into my care immediately.

 Signed,
[From.GetFirstName] of House [From.GetTitle]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], although it pains me, I will of course respect your authority and free your kinsmen from slavery as commanded. I shall send them to [Root.Capital.GetName] at once.

 Regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]

[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFOA], whilst they may be your kinsmen, the laws of the realm dictate I do not have to give up what is rightly my property. I must refuse your request.

 Regards,
[From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]
Traitor! I will get them one way or another!
No, they are rightfully my property.
Your former slave, [From.GetBestName], has managed to leave your service and is now a free [From.GetManWoman].
